prelaunch.label: Coming Soon
prelaunch.title: Coming Soon
prelaunch.description: Promoting dahlia exhibition, hybridization, and education

home.label: Home
home.title: Home
home.description: A New England dahlia club based in Wocester and Middlesex county in Massachusetts. We invite dahlia growers all throughout the New England area. Our club is a proud member of the American Dahlia Society

fundraiser.label: Fundraiser
fundraiser.title: YDS Dahlia Supplies Fundraiser
fundraiser.description: As a new club just over one year old, we need to purchase floral exhibit supplies and floral containers to provide for our Dahlia Exhibits now and for years to come. We appreciate your support to help us reach our goal. Thank you for your donation!

shop.label: Shop
shop.title: Y.D.S. Online Shop
shop.description: Buy tubers, cuttings, supplies & gift certificates to help grow dahlias and to grow Y.D.S.

all-products.label: All Products
all-products.title: Y.D.S. Online Shop - All Products
all-products.description: Buy tubers, cuttings, supplies & gift certificates to help grow dahlias and to grow Y.D.S.

membership.label: Membership
membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Become a member of Yankee Dahlia Society to attend meetings, classes and garden tours.

join.label: Join
join.title: Membership Registration
join.description: Become a member of Yankee Dahlia Society to attend meetings, classes and garden tours.

getInvolved.label: Get Involved
getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Get more involved with Yankee Dahlia Society, volunteer, let us tour your garden. There are plenty of fun ways to get more involved.

meetings.label: Meetings
meetings.title: Meetings
meetings.description: Find out when we are having our next meeting, event or garden tour and plan ahead to join in on the fun.

shows.label: Shows
shows.title: Dahlia Shows
shows.description: A calendar of regional and international Dahlia shows.

tubers.label: Our Tubers
tubers.title: Our Tubers
tubers.description: Find out about our annual tuber sales and tuber swaps. Get some of your favorite dahlia varieties and help to support Yankee Dahlia Society at the same time

about.label: About Us
about.title: About Us
about.description: We had a vision of creating a fun space where people who love dahlias could gather and connect, in person and through social media, to learn, have fun, and enjoy growing dahlias together.

contact.label: Contact Us
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with Yankee Dahlia Society. Find us on Instagram or Facebook, ask dahlia growing questions or just let us know you're coming to a meeting.

businessMembers.label: Businesses
businessMembers.title: Business Members
businessMembers.description: Get in touch with Yankee Dahlia Society. Find us on Instagram or Facebook, ask dahlia growing questions or just let us know you're coming to a meeting.

businessMembershipInfo.label: Business Membership Info
businessMembershipInfo.title: Get the most out of your business membership
businessMembershipInfo.description: We welcome our great business members. Now that you're a member, find out how to make the absolute most of your business membership.

badgeInfo.label: Member Badge Usage Info
badgeInfo.title: Member Badge Usage Info
badgeInfo.description: How to use the Y.D.S. membership badge on your website and marketing materials
